data.comment: Today's referee, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira, has blown to start the match.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira blows against Botafogo's Salomon Kalou for offside.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 7, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Recife.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Free kick Botafogo.
In the minute 11, Rhuan for Botafogo drives towards goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Botafogo just outside Recife PE's area.
Recife PE's Patric has been booked in Recife.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Recife PE.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 19, Rhuan for Botafogo is whistled offside.
Recife PE's Luciano misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 23, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Recife PE's Chico breaks free at Ilha do Retiro. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 24, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Botafogo throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Botafogo drive upfield and Rafael Forster gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo's Victor Luis gets in a shot on goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Keisuke Honda gives Botafogo a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 31, Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Recife PE are coming forward and Hernane Brocador gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Recife PE.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Botafogo at Ilha do Retiro.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 37, Keisuke Honda for Botafogo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Recife PE throw-in in Botafogo's half.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Rafael Forster (Botafogo) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 41, Recife PE are pushing forward but Patric's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Free kick Recife PE.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Botafogo a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a throw-in for Botafogo, close to Recife PE's area.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
In Recife Botafogo attack through Rhuan. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Rhuan (Botafogo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Botafogo take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Caio Alexandre.
Kanu with an assist there.
The second-half is underway in Recife.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Botafogo.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Can Recife PE capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Hernane Brocador (Recife PE) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Botafogo throw-in in Recife PE's half.
At Ilha do Retiro, Rafael Forster has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 54, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Goal for Recife PE! They are now just 1-2 behind thanks to a Thiago Neves header.
That's a fine assist from Luciano.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 57, The away team have replaced Salomon Kalou with Guilherme Santos. This is the first substitution made today by Paulo Autuori.
Recife PE's Adryelson attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Botafogo.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
In the minute 60, Recife PE's Thiago Neves gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Important block from the Botafogo defence as Patric fires in a strike for Recife PE.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Free kick Botafogo.
Ricardinho (Recife PE) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 66, Hernane Brocador (Recife PE) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Recife PE throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Rogerio is on a sub for Hernane Brocador for Recife PE.
In the minute 67, The home team replace Marquinhos with Lucas Mugni.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Caio Alexandre is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Caio Alexandre is back on his feet again.
In Recife Recife PE drive forward through Thiago Neves. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 75, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thiago Neves is booked for the home team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Rhuan for Botafogo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 77, Recife PE make their third substitution with Bruninho replacing Ricardinho.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 79, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Ilha do Retiro.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Recife PE.
Botafogo's Rhuan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Botafogo's Guilherme Santos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 81, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Rogerio of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 88, Rhuan, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Warley is the substitute for Botafogo.
Rhuan (Botafogo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 89, Carlos Renteria is replacing Caio Alexandre for Botafogo at Ilha do Retiro.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Recife PE throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Botafogo.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Botafogo.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Recife PE.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Botafogo.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In Recife, Lucas Mugni of Recife PE is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Ilha do Retiro.
That's full-time at Ilha do Retiro. The final score is 1-2.
Maxwell is replacing Leandro Barcia for the home team.
Jonathan Gomez is replacing Marcao Silva for the home team.
At Ilha do Retiro, Jonathan Gomez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
